technology: There were no technical difficulties experienced by the participant.
cur_neg_affect: The participant does not express much negative affect about the pandemic in the present, mainly stating that it is not as prevalent in their life now.
past_neg_affect: The participant mentions that their birthday was right around when things picked up in March, and they didn't go out, indicating a mild negative affect about the past.
communal_orientation: The participant actively listens, asks follow-up questions, and shares their own experiences in relation to the conversation partner's, showing a moderate level of communal orientation.
engagement: The participant is very engaged in the conversation, sharing their experiences, asking questions, and building upon the conversation partner's points.
defensiveness: The participant does not display any defensiveness in justifying their beliefs or perspective.

vaccine_importance: The participant indicates that vaccines are important, stating that they got vaccinated because they thought it was the right thing to do at the time.
booster_importance: The participant got the booster for traveling purposes, suggesting that they believe boosters are somewhat important for specific situations.
cognitive_complexity: The participant demonstrates a moderate level of cognitive complexity by considering different perspectives on vaccines and health, and acknowledging the nuances of the situation.
general_notes: The participant seems open-minded and willing to share their experiences and perspectives. They actively engage with the conversation partner and demonstrate a good understanding of the topic.
